parameter.name: numberLength
parameter.description: Minimum length of the customer number (to be filled with leading zeros).

parameter.name: bankAccountNumber
parameter.description: Bank account number of the Client.

parameter.name: bankAccountOwner
parameter.description: Bank account owner of the Client.

parameter.name: bankNumber
parameter.description: Bank identifier code of the Client.

parameter.name: sepaMandate
parameter.description: Mandate reference of a SEPA Direct Debit mandate.

parameter.name: sepaMandateDate
parameter.description: Date of issue of the SEPA Direct Debit mandate.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: Locale of the client. If no value is passed, the locale of the account will be applied to the client.

parameter.name: netGross
parameter.description: Price basis (net, gross, according to account settings).

parameter.name: discountRateType
parameter.description: Type of the default value for discount rate.

parameter.name: discountDaysType
parameter.description: Type of the default value for discount interval.

parameter.name: dueDaysType
parameter.description: Type of the default value for maturity.

parameter.name: dueDays
parameter.description: Maturity in days from invoice date .

parameter.name: reminderDueDaysType
parameter.description: Type of the default value for reminder maturity.

parameter.name: offerValidityDaysType
parameter.description: Type of the default value for validity of estimates.

parameter.name: currencyCode
parameter.description: The currency for this client. If this field is empty, the account currency is used.

parameter.name: priceGroup
parameter.description: Artciles can have several prices. The pricegroup defines which price applies to the client.

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.description: ID of the client to update.
